@randomdude20: Precisely. You, sir, are a gentleman and a scholar. Well, at least ONE of those things, anyways...

Also for others saying it this is definitely not NTR. Cheating doesnt always mean NTR in Hentai. There is a reason why there is a individual cheating tag and a separate NTR one and thats cause they can be related but sometimes its not NTR. NTR involves showing the feeling of either betrayal most of the time and/or corruption or a person from their relationship. Plus it always shows the person being cheating on too whether they find out or not. Anyway this has none of that and its just cheating with no negative feelings. Not NTR.
